outputs.output_descr: Enhance capacities of Government and CSO entities through financial, technical/advisory support to address emerging environmental challenges and provide inputs to policy development and overall development discourse in Bhutan.

project_descr: The project will support the revision of National Environment Strategy; government's electric vehicle initiative; promote green jobs and employment opportunities; and strengthen capacities of NGO's in policy research on environment.
project_title: UN Support to government onemerging environmental issues
